I've hardly had any time for computer stuff this summer : (.  Maybe when
I get back to school in the fall.. .

Daniel Paul Hightower wrote:
> 
> On thing I have been meaning to suggest for you guys working on the
> new scenario editor is that while one person works on getting the
> graphics to completely work, someone else works on upgrades a scenario
> converter into a full-fledged text-based scenario editor.
> 
> Another feature I would like to add to the wish list is a sort feature
> for saving the grid files.  It would put all objects that are similiar
> (for example, player 1 positions) all close together to make it easier
> to see where the possible player start positions are.  This would have
> to be done where the player positions stay in the same order they were
> before, but they would all be close together.
> 
> 
> The Gladiator Mailing List
> 
>
